function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data security in mobile applications for COVID-19 surveillance","Impact":"Loss of personal data, potential privacy breaches, and misuse of sensitive health information","Mitigation":"Implement strong data encryption, strict access control, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems, security auditing tools","People":"Citizens using the mobile applications, health authorities collecting and analyzing data","Owner":"Software engineers, health authorities, and app developers"},{"Description":"Ineffective contact tracing leading to virus transmission","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19, difficulty in controlling infection, and higher risk to public health","Mitigation":"Improved proximity tracking technology, increased testing and surveillance, and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Proximity tracking technology, testing and surveillance tools, communication platforms","People":"Citizens using contact tracing apps, health authorities conducting surveillance","Owner":"Health authorities, software engineers, and mobile app developers"},{"Description":"Lack of transparency and accountability in data administration","Impact":"Loss of public trust, misinformation, and confusion regarding COVID-19 response efforts","Mitigation":"Implement data governance policies, transparency in data handling, and regular public communication","Technologies":"Data governance frameworks, transparency tools, communication platforms","People":"General public, government agencies, health authorities","Owner":"Government agencies, health authorities, and data administrators"}]}
